pageContext.claim: “The Fake News photoshopped pictures of Melania, then propelled conspiracy theories that it’s actually not her by my side in Alabama and other places. They are only getting more deranged with time!”
pageContext.analysis: The president presented no evidence to support his theory that media outlets photoshopped the First Lady. If true, it would present a major ethical breach. The theory began with Twitter users comparing her body language, height and facial structure.
